job.title: Machine Learning Engineer III
job.description: strongTitle Machine Learning Engineer III brbrstrongstronguOverview Of PositionbrbrustrongWere looking for a dynamic ML Engineer with a passion for artificial intelligence to help drive a new generation of data and machine learningenabled services and products to impact healthcare supporting Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning and Data Science solutions for Change HealthcarebrbrYoull enjoy working with a highly talented and diverse team of Engineers and Data Scientists specializing in deep learning active learning and classical machine learning one of the richest data sets in US healthcare nearly limitless cloud compute resources including Spark clusters and GPUs and the ability to see your insights turned into real productsbrbrstrong What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job strongulliliulli Design build and launch efficient amp reliable data pipelines to move and transform data both large and small amounts  lili Assemble large complex data sets that meet business requirements lili Optimize data delivery and redesign infrastructure for greater scalability lili Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction transformation and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources lili Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics lili Design elegant interfaces between internal services and internal customers Design build and launch new data extraction transformation and loading processes in production lili Work with internal and external stakeholders to assist with datarelated technical issues and support data infrastructure needs brliululstrong What are the requirements needed for this position brstrongulliMasters degree in Computer Sciences or Mathematics OR Bachelorss degree in Computer Sciences or Mathematics 3 years of equivalent work experiencelili 2 years of professional experience building and operating scalable distributed systems across the full software lifecycle including design implementation testing operations and maintenance lili Programming experience in one or more modern programming languages such as Java Python Scala or C lili AWS technologies Lambda EMR EC2 SQS and RDS etc  lili Handson experience in tackling massive data sets with Yarn Spark Presto Hive Impala etc lili Familiarity with keyvalue stores and NoSQL databases like HBase Cassandra Hive etc lili Experience with CICD using Jenkins lili Familiarity with shell scripting using Bash or Zsh brliulstrong What other skillsexperience would be helpful to have brstrongulli Curious  willing to learn new things and try new things able to implement prototypes liliCommunicative  Comfortable presenting to other engineers sharing ideas and writing specifications and other documentationlili Sense of Urgency  bring an agile lets get things done attitude lili Prior experience with healthcare data is a plus  but if you dont have experience with healthcare data we will teach you everything you need to know brliulstrong What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job brstrongulliGeneral office demandsbrliulnorthwestbrbrsouthwestbrbrJoin our team today where we are creating a better coordinated increasingly collaborative and more
